item.description:
I am THRILLED to announce that Karen has arranged for us to have a full day of ATC-making at the Michaels store in Natick, Mass., on Saturday, Sept. 15. Thank you, Karen! Your effort made my day.

We'll go from 10 a.m. to 5 or 6 p.m. There's a minimal cost for the workspace ($25), which we can divide among those who show up.

In terms of location, this is a terrific venue. It's easy to find from the Mass Pike, Route 9 or Route 30. There's plenty of free parking. There are literally a dozen restaurants nearby where we can get takeout for lunch. If anyone wants to go out for dinner afterward, we can certainly consider that.

Also, if you need supplies and Michaels doesn't have what you want, there's an AC Moore right up the road.

So mark your calendars. And RSVP quickly, even if you can't be there for the whole day or you have to change your response later -- it will help immensely to have an approximate headcount.

By the way, I'm on vacation in the Berkshires this week, and I made a bunch of cards, which I look forward to swapping.

Again, a big THANK YOU to Karen, who made this happen for all of us.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: New England ATC Meetup Group Fall Hands-On Extravanganza
